{{champion:267}} Spooky when long dead threads come back from the grave!

While the art of thread necromancy can be useful in some cases, this unfortunately, is not one of those times. I am putting this poor zombie back gently into that good night. 

RIP thread.

Everyone here seems to be mad at how much damage she does. Listen guys. That's her job. She's an assassin, she's SUPPOSED to deal a lot of damage. She isn't tanky, and her only "cc" is gunblade. CC will DESTROY her very quickly. She isn't broken. Katarina is good at punishing mistakes, and that's why she is such a big threat to low elo, because they make mistakes all the time. If your team lets Kat get fed, that's your own fault, not Riot's fault for having a "broken" champion.

This champion isn't balanced at all. It's practically impossible to stop a good Katarina players unless you have a click on stun and even then, it's not hard to play around a champion like that. You pretty much HAVE to have a Lissandra or someone on your team to stop her. She's bullshit.
There's a reason no one plays Katarina in LCS. They're good enough to be able to counter her. If you can't play against one, then you just aren't good enough.

My problem with Katarina is that she's either 360 no scope face fucking your entire team or she's completely useless and hot garbage. Her role placement for mid is 35/46 yet has the highest kill percentage of any champ. 

I don't think she's broken, I think her design is simply flawed.

Watching a Katarina deal 50% of your current health at Level 3 in less than a second is not fun to be honest. It would be nice if Riot would nerf AT LEAST her early game, because despite how bad a Katarina player plays the early game, she still deals an excessive amount of damage in the mid and late game.
It's called having good positioning. If you do, then kat should never be able to use her Q dagger on you
